name: html-parsed-element
description: A base custom element class with a reliable `parsedCallback` method

scripts.build: npm run cjs && npm run esm && npm run min && npm run size
scripts.cjs: cp index.js cjs && echo 'module.exports = HTMLParsedElement;' >> cjs/index.js
scripts.esm: cp index.js esm && echo 'export default HTMLParsedElement;' >> esm/index.js
scripts.size: cat index.js | wc -c;cat min.js | wc -c;gzip -c9 min.js | wc -c;cat min.js | brotli | wc -c && rm -f min.js.br
scripts.test: npm run instrument && npm run server & sleep 1 && npm run nightmare && npm run report

author: Andrea Giammarchi
